item.title: Rails 5.1 API with Vue.js frontend, part 0: stack choices
item.description: I’ve been rather busy lately, and my progress in learning Vue.js has slowed down. However, I think that I’m ready to dive into making something more resembling a real application that Monster Hunter and GalaxyQuest. I believe that you learn best when your objective is teaching it to somebody else. Therefore, over the next couple of weeks I’ll be making and refining a simple bookstore app1, using Rails 5.1 for the API backend, and vue.
